AddDBInstanceToReadOnlyGroup.document: This API is used to add a read-only replica to an RO group.
AddDBInstanceToReadOnlyGroup.name: Adds a read-only replica to an RO group

CloneDBInstance.document: This API is used to clone an instance by specifying a backup set or a point in time.
CloneDBInstance.name: Clones an instance

CloseDBExtranetAccess.document: This API is used to disable the public network link to an instance.
CloseDBExtranetAccess.name: Disables public network link to instance

CloseServerlessDBExtranetAccess.document: This API is used to disable public network access for a PostgreSQL for Serverless instance.
CloseServerlessDBExtranetAccess.name: Disables public network access for a PostgreSQL for Serverless instance

CreateDBInstanceNetworkAccess.document: This API is used to add a network for an instance.
CreateDBInstanceNetworkAccess.name: Adds a network for an instance

CreateDBInstances.document: This API is used to create (but not initialize) one or more TencentDB for PostgreSQL instances.
CreateDBInstances.name: Creates instances (deprecated soon)

CreateInstances.document: This API is used to create and initialize one or more TencentDB for PostgreSQL instances.
CreateInstances.name: Creates instances (recommended)

CreateParameterTemplate.document: This API is used to create a parameter template.
CreateParameterTemplate.name: Creates a parameter template

CreateReadOnlyDBInstance.document: This API is used to create read-only replicas.
CreateReadOnlyDBInstance.name: Creates read-only replicas

CreateReadOnlyGroup.document: This API is used to create an RO group.
CreateReadOnlyGroup.name: Creates an RO group

CreateReadOnlyGroupNetworkAccess.document: This API is used to add a network for an RO group.
CreateReadOnlyGroupNetworkAccess.name: Adds a network for an RO group

CreateServerlessDBInstance.document: This API is used to create a PostgreSQL for Serverless instance. If the creation succeeds, the instance ID will be returned.
CreateServerlessDBInstance.name: Creates a PostgreSQL for Serverless instance

DeleteDBInstanceNetworkAccess.document: This API is used to delete a network of an instance.
DeleteDBInstanceNetworkAccess.name: Deletes a network of an instance

DeleteParameterTemplate.document: This API is used to delete a parameter template.
DeleteParameterTemplate.name: Deletes a parameter template

DeleteReadOnlyGroup.document: This API is used to delete an RO group.
DeleteReadOnlyGroup.name: Deletes an RO group

DeleteReadOnlyGroupNetworkAccess.document: This API is used to delete a network of an RO group.
DeleteReadOnlyGroupNetworkAccess.name: Deletes a network of an RO group

DeleteServerlessDBInstance.document: This API is used to delete a PostgreSQL for Serverless instance.
DeleteServerlessDBInstance.name: Deletes a PostgreSQL for Serverless instance

DescribeAccounts.document: This API is used to get the instance user list.
DescribeAccounts.name: Gets instance user list

DescribeAvailableRecoveryTime.document: This API is used to query the available restoration time of an instance.
DescribeAvailableRecoveryTime.name: Queries the available restoration time of an instance

DescribeBackupPlans.document: This API is used to query all backup plans of an instance.
DescribeBackupPlans.name: Queries backup plans

DescribeCloneDBInstanceSpec.document: This API is used to query the minimum specification required by a cloned instance, including `SpecCode` and disk specification.
DescribeCloneDBInstanceSpec.name: Queries the purchasable specification of a cloned instance

DescribeDBBackups.document: This API is used to query the instance backup list.
DescribeDBBackups.name: Queries instance backup list

DescribeDBErrlogs.document: This API is used to get error logs.
DescribeDBErrlogs.name: Gets error logs

DescribeDBInstanceAttribute.document: This API is used to query the details of one instance.
DescribeDBInstanceAttribute.name: Queries instance details

DescribeDBInstanceParameters.document: This API is used to get the list of modifiable parameters of an instance.
DescribeDBInstanceParameters.name: Gets the list of modifiable parameters of an instance

DescribeDBInstanceSecurityGroups.document: This API is used to query the security group information of an instance.
DescribeDBInstanceSecurityGroups.name: Queries the security group information of an instance

DescribeDBInstances.document: This API is used to query the details of one or more instances.
DescribeDBInstances.name: Queries instance list

DescribeDBSlowlogs.document: This API was used to get slow query logs. Since it was deprecated on September 1, 2021, it has no longer returned data. Please use the [DescribeSlowQueryList](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/409/60540?from_cn_redirect=1) API instead to get slow query logs.
DescribeDBSlowlogs.name: Gets slow query logs (deprecated)

DescribeDBXlogs.document: This API is used to get the instance Xlog list.
DescribeDBXlogs.name: Gets instance Xlog list

DescribeDatabases.document: This API is used to pull the list of databases.
DescribeDatabases.name: Pulls database list

DescribeDefaultParameters.document: This API is used to query all parameters supported by a database version and engine.
DescribeDefaultParameters.name: Queries the list of default parameters

DescribeEncryptionKeys.document: This API is used to get instance key list.
DescribeEncryptionKeys.name: Gets instance key list

DescribeOrders.document: This API is used to get order information.
DescribeOrders.name: Gets order information

DescribeParameterTemplateAttributes.document: This API is used to query the details of a parameter template, including basic information and parameter information.
DescribeParameterTemplateAttributes.name: Queries the details of a parameter template

DescribeParameterTemplates.document: This API is used to query the list of parameter templates.
DescribeParameterTemplates.name: Queries the list of parameter templates

DescribeParamsEvent.document: This API is used to get the details of parameter modification events.
DescribeParamsEvent.name: Gets the details of parameter modification events

DescribeProductConfig.document: This API is used to query the purchasable specification configuration.
DescribeProductConfig.name: Queries purchasable specification configuration

DescribeReadOnlyGroups.document: This API is used to query RO group information by specifying the primary instance IDs.
DescribeReadOnlyGroups.name: Queries RO group information

DescribeRegions.document: This API is used to query the purchasable regions.
DescribeRegions.name: Queries purchasable regions

DescribeServerlessDBInstances.document: This API is used to query the details of one or more PostgreSQL for Serverless instances.
DescribeServerlessDBInstances.name: Queries the list of PostgreSQL for Serverless instances

DescribeSlowQueryAnalysis.document: This API is used to count and analyze slow query statements during the specified period of time and return aggregated statistical analysis results which are classified by statement with abstract parameter values.
DescribeSlowQueryAnalysis.name: Gets the statistical analysis list of slow queries

DescribeSlowQueryList.document: This API is used to get the slow queries during the specified period of time.
DescribeSlowQueryList.name: Gets the slow query list

DescribeZones.document: This API is used to query the supported AZs.
DescribeZones.name: Queries purchasable AZs

DestroyDBInstance.document: This API is used to terminate an isolated instance by specifying the `DBInstanceId` parameter. The data of an terminated instance will be deleted and cannot be recovered.
DestroyDBInstance.name: Terminates an instance

DisIsolateDBInstances.document: This API is used to remove one or more instances from isolation.
DisIsolateDBInstances.name: Removes instances from isolation

InitDBInstances.document: This API is used to initialize a TencentDB for PostgreSQL instance.
InitDBInstances.name: Initializes instance

InquiryPriceCreateDBInstances.document: This API is used to query the purchase price of one or multiple instances.
InquiryPriceCreateDBInstances.name: Queries purchase price

InquiryPriceRenewDBInstance.document: This API is used to query the renewal price of an instance.
InquiryPriceRenewDBInstance.name: Queries the renewal price of instance

InquiryPriceUpgradeDBInstance.document: This API is used to query the fees of upgrading a specified database instance. Only pay-as-you-go instance is supported.
InquiryPriceUpgradeDBInstance.name: Queries the upgrade price of instance

IsolateDBInstances.document: This API is used to isolate one or more instances.
IsolateDBInstances.name: Isolates instances

ModifyAccountRemark.document: This API is used to modify account remarks.
ModifyAccountRemark.name: Modifies account remarks

ModifyBackupPlan.document: This API is used to modify the backup plan of an instance, such as modifying the backup start time. By default, a full backup starts at midnight every day and the generated backup files will be retained for seven days.
ModifyBackupPlan.name: Modifies a backup plan

ModifyDBInstanceDeployment.document: This API is used to modify the AZs where the nodes of a source instance reside.
ModifyDBInstanceDeployment.name: Modifies the instance deployment mode

ModifyDBInstanceName.document: This API is used to rename a TencentDB for PostgreSQL instance.
ModifyDBInstanceName.name: Renames instance

ModifyDBInstanceParameters.document: This API is used to modify parameters in batches.
ModifyDBInstanceParameters.name: Modifies parameters in batches

ModifyDBInstanceReadOnlyGroup.document: This API is used to modify the RO group of an instance.
ModifyDBInstanceReadOnlyGroup.name: Modifies the RO group of an instance

ModifyDBInstanceSecurityGroups.document: This API is used to modify the security group of an instance.
ModifyDBInstanceSecurityGroups.name: Modifies the security group of an instance

ModifyDBInstanceSpec.document: This API is used to modify instance specifications including memory and disk size.
ModifyDBInstanceSpec.name: Modifies instance specifications (new)

ModifyDBInstancesProject.document: This API is used to transfer an instance to another project.
ModifyDBInstancesProject.name: Transfers instance to another project

ModifyParameterTemplate.document: This API is used to modify the parameter template name and description, and add or delete parameter template parameters.
ModifyParameterTemplate.name: Modifies the parameter template information

ModifyReadOnlyGroupConfig.document: This API is used to modify RO group configuration.
ModifyReadOnlyGroupConfig.name: Modifies RO group configuration

ModifySwitchTimePeriod.document: This API is used to perform a primary-standby switch for an instance waiting for the switch after it is upgraded.
ModifySwitchTimePeriod.name: Modifies the switch time after configuration upgrade

OpenDBExtranetAccess.document: This API is used to enable public network access.
OpenDBExtranetAccess.name: Enables public network access

OpenServerlessDBExtranetAccess.document: This API is used to enable public network access for a PostgreSQL for Serverless instance.
OpenServerlessDBExtranetAccess.name: Enables public network access for a PostgreSQL for Serverless instance

RebalanceReadOnlyGroup.document: This API is used to rebalance the loads of read-only replicas in an RO group. Please note that connections to those read-only replicas will be interrupted transiently; therefore, you should ensure that your application can reconnect to the databases. This operation should be performed with caution.
RebalanceReadOnlyGroup.name: Rebalances the loads of read-only replicas in an RO group

RemoveDBInstanceFromReadOnlyGroup.document: This API is used to remove a read-only replica from an RO group.
RemoveDBInstanceFromReadOnlyGroup.name: Removes a read-only replica from an RO group

RenewInstance.document: This API is used to renew an instance.
RenewInstance.name: Renews instance

ResetAccountPassword.document: This API is used to reset the account password of an instance.
ResetAccountPassword.name: Resets account password

RestartDBInstance.document: This API is used to restart an instance.
RestartDBInstance.name: Restarts instance

SetAutoRenewFlag.document: This API is used to set auto-renewal.
SetAutoRenewFlag.name: Sets auto-renewal

UpgradeDBInstance.document: This API is used to upgrade instance configurations.
UpgradeDBInstance.name: Upgrades instance configuration (deprecated)

members.document:
Database engine. Valid values:
1. `postgresql` (TencentDB for PostgreSQL)
2. `mssql_compatible`（MSSQL compatible-TencentDB for PostgreSQL)
Default value: `postgresql`
members.name: DBEngine

members.document:
Configuration information of database engine in the following format:
{"$key1":"$value1", "$key2":"$value2"}

Valid values:
1. mssql_compatible engine：
`migrationMode`: Database mode. Valid values: `single-db` (single-database mode), `multi-db` (multi-database mode). Default value: `single-db`.
`defaultLocale`: Default locale, which can’t be modified after the initialization. Default value: `en_US`. Valid values:

Value type of the parameter. Valid values: `integer`, `real` (floating-point), `bool`, `enum`, `mutil_enum` (this type of parameter can be set to multiple enumerated values).
For an `integer` or `real` parameter, the `Min` field represents the minimum value and the `Max` field the maximum value. 
For a `bool` parameter, the valid values include `true` and `false`; 
For an `enum` or `mutil_enum` parameter, the `EnumValue` field represents the valid values.
Note: this field may return `null`, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: ParamValueType
